original_text: At that time, the Lord God will wash away the dirt from Zion's women. He will make Jerusalem clean from the blood that murderers have left. He will do that as judge, and he will punish people as with fire.
korean_text: 이는 주께서 심판하는 영과 소멸하는 영으로 시온의 딸들의 더러움을 씻기시며 예루살렘의 피를 그 중에서 청결하게 하실 때가 됨이라

sentences.original_text: the Lord God will wash away the dirt
sentences.korean_translation: 주 하나님은 더러운 것을 씻어내실 것입니다

sentences.original_text: from the blood that murderers have left
He will do that as judge
and he will punish people as with fire
